snippet: Saudi Arabia has detained 88 people on suspicion of plotting terrorist attacks at home and abroad, the Interior Ministry said Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: Saudi Arabia has detained 88 people on suspicion of plotting terrorist attacks at home and abroad, the Interior Ministry said Tuesday.

headline.main: Saudi Arabia: 88 Held on Suspicion of Terrorist Ties
headline.print_headline: Saudi Arabia: 88 Held on Suspicion of Terrorist Ties
